alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Quay County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 8:39PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL SAN MIGUEL...EASTERN HARDING...NORTHEASTERN QUAY AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM MDT... At 839 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Sedan to 10 miles northeast of Logan. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Logan, Amistad, Nara Visa, Hayden, Sedan, Rosebud, and Ute Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM MDT for northeastern and east central New Mexico.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Quay County; Union County
